import React from 'react' import { secondsToDuration, minutesToDuration } from "../utils/duration"; function ProgressBar({session, focusDuration, breakDuration}) { const start = session?.label === "Focusing" ? focusDuration * 60 : breakDuration * 60; const percentage = 100 * (1 -session?.timeRemaining / start); const countDown = session?.label === "On Break" ? minutesToDuration(breakDuration) : minutesToDuration(focusDuration); return ( session &&
{/** TODO: Update message below to include current session (Focusing or On Break) total duration */}

{session?.label} for {countDown} minutes

{/* TODO: Update message below correctly format the time remaining in the current session */}

{secondsToDuration(session?.timeRemaining)} remaining

Paused

) } export default ProgressBar
